sub_title: Harnessing Data Science for a Better World!
summary:
Hi, I'm Yousef, a research-driven data scientist passionate about harnessing the power of data science to create a positive impact on the world!  With a Ph.D. in computer science and a diverse professional background spanning academia and industry, I bring a unique perspective to my work in data science.
I have pursued my academic and professional journey across the Netherlands, Malaysia, India, Saudi Arabia, and Yemen developing a sharp problem-solving, team-oriented, diversity and inclusion, critical, and analytical thinking mindset. These skills allow me to approach complex data challenges with creativity and efficiency, always striving to find innovative solutions.
My diverse professional experience across academia and industry, along with my leadership positions, awards, scholarships, and international certificates, reflect my dedication to continuous learning and growth.

profile_positions.title: Researcher Assistant & Analyst

profile_positions.description: I was selected by the School of Graduate Studies (SGS) at Universiti Putra Malaysia (UPM) to be the University Ambassador (Student Recruitment Ambassador) for two years in order to promote the university vision and programs among international students and attract more students to the university.
profile_positions.title: Student Ambassador

profile_positions.description:
Universiti Putra Malaysia International Students' Association (UPMISA) is the official association of all international students studying at UPM. There are students from over 70 countries from around the world studying in UPM adding to our rich and unique cultural identity. Despite this cultural diversity on campus, our strength and pride lie in our unity. 

UPMISA represents students at meetings with the management and look out for the interest of UPM students anywhere. Exco members govern the association and together with country representatives, they form the general assembly which takes major decisions on behalf of international students.
profile_positions.title: Country Representative of Yemen at the International Students' Association (UPMISA)

volunteer_experiences.description:
Yemeni Students' union in Malaysia has 15 branches in 15 Malaysian universities and is responsible for 6000 students and more. I was elected as the president of the Administrative Body of the General Union which is the highest executive body elected by members of the General Conference and represents all Yemeni students in Malaysia.

As the president I was assigned to the following responsibilities:
1. Chairs the meetings of the Administrative Board.
2. Manage and supervise all the activities of the administrative body, and follow up the members of the body to overcome any difficulties that may face their work.
3. Call for meetings of the members of the General Union or the General Conference under its chairmanship.
4. Representing the Union at the official bodies and representatives, organizations and institutions.
5. Submit periodic reports on the progress of the work of the administrative body to the General Union  and the control and inspection committee of the General Union.
6. Follow up the submission of the final reports on the progress of the General Union of the General Conference.
7. Sign and seal the financial documents and direct the exchange.
8. Sign and seal all correspondence.

volunteer_experiences.role: Country Representative of Yemen at the International Students' Association (UPMISA)
volunteer_experiences.description:
Universiti Putra Malaysia International Students' Association (UPMISA) is the official association of all international students studying at UPM. There are students from over 70 countries from around the world studying in UPM adding to our rich and unique cultural identity. Despite this cultural diversity on campus, our strength and pride lie in our unity.

UPMISA represents students at meetings with the management and look out for the interest of UPM students anywhere. Exco members govern the association and together with country representatives, they form the general assembly which takes major decisions on behalf of international students.

Developing / customising a Library Toys Lending System, 
managing and operating the system, 
identifying any problems in the system,
anticipating potential issues,
and repairing systems and software when necessary.
